title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8155.29 - Town of Bedford
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8155.29 - Town of Bedford

State Regulations
(a) Katonah

By-Pass Access Road (Route 117). The Katonah By-Pass Access Road (Route 117)
from I-684 (exit 5 of I-684) to Harris Road, a distance of 1.7+-
miles. (b) Harris Road (Route 117). Harris Road (Route 117) from Adams Street to Bedford Road (Route 117), a
distance of 0.1+- mile. (c) Route
117 (Bedford Road). Route 117 (Bedford Road) from Harris Road to Norm Avenue
(private drive), a distance of 2.3+- miles. Notes

8155.29

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
